description: Feature schema for ROSHN Brain (component-calibrated planning model). Order is the model's required input vector order.

features.name: resource
features.description: Composite of standardized Labor_Hours, Equipment_Utilization, Material_Usage

features.name: site_env
features.description: Composite of standardized Temperature, Humidity, Air_Quality_Index

features.name: schedule
features.description: Standardized Planned_Duration + coarse seasonality term from Start_Date month
